data.actual_result: More top than bottom margin on Android inside the embed as well as in the whole message: https://i.imgur.com/0fC69I5.png
data.expected_result: Equal top and bottom margins like on desktop: https://i.imgur.com/IMDZxgt.png
data.short_description: Embeds with only a descriptions have more margin above than below and all embeds have too much space above them
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a message with a RichEmbed containing a description
